channel.title: Questions
channel.description:
Here is a few questions answer any you know. Thanks
1. What file would I go to to change the yell colors/wording.
2. What file would I go to to change the size of monsters without changing the picture (like is there a thingy thats like rock crab size 2 and i change the 2 to like 5 or 1 or whatever to make it bigger or smaller.
3. What file would I go to to change the combat of monsters.
4. What file/files would I go to to change the names of items and monsters and objects.
Thanks alot for your guys help Im just playing around trying to learn how to change stuff atm on a server. I dont ever really intend on running a server for others to play on as its not my type of thing anymore like it used to be. I just like to get on a rsps and change stuff and play around and have fun :)

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

HIGHK9:

I seen other servers have it and thought it was cool so im make maybe a boss monster and resize and change its level and drops

with resizing you mean changing the model size? that’s client sided, you also have to update the size in the npc.dat config file in the cache.

to change the names of objects, items and npcs. also client sided. config files obj.dat/obj.idx npc.dat/npc.idx and loc.dat/loc.idx (this probably doesn’t make any sense to you)

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

^ No one can really supply you valid support unless you tell us some things about the source, such as:

[ul][li]Source Revision[/li]
[li]Source Name[/li][/ul]

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

Assuming is a PI source

  1. What file would I go to to change the yell colors/wording.
    commands.java

  2. What file would I go to to change the size of monsters without changing the picture (like is there a thingy thats like rock crab size 2 and i change the 2 to like 5 or 1 or whatever to make it bigger or smaller.
    npchandler.java

  3. What file would I go to to change the combat of monsters.
    its called npc idk what the extention is

  4. What file/files would I go to to change the names of items and monsters and objects.
    i believe this is client sided

Read full topic
